Joke-ID: ffffffff-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddddddddddd
Title: The Mathematician's Garden
Submitter: test@example.com
Source-Email-File: test_email4.txt
Pipeline-Stage: 04_clean_checked
Duplicate-Score: 20
Duplicate-Threshold: 70
Cleanliness-Status: PASS
Cleanliness-Confidence: 95

A mathematician planted a garden. When asked why all the plants were in perfect rows and columns, he replied, "I wanted to see if I could grow square roots."
